DOC.criteria: Male female Age : 4565 Absence DSM IVR diagnosis As establish MiniPsychiatric Interview HAMD < 8 Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 30.0 Not Suicidal Current ( past 2 month ) substance use disorder , Abuse Caffeine Severe nicotine dependence Abuse herbal dietary supplement Current plan pregnancy ( female ) A major DSM IVR psychiatric diagnosis .
